body: Name changes came out so i decided to do an AMA. Ask me anything! :)
body_tagged: Name changes came out so i decided to do an AMA. Ask me anything! :)
title: [AMA]

replies.body: How did you come up with your new name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your new name?

replies.body: You've been saying that on several posts now and it's getting a bit spammy. Please stop or a nice web ban will be issued.
replies.body_tagged: You've been saying that on several posts now and it's getting a bit spammy. Please stop or a nice web ban will be issued.

replies.body: My original name was 07SilverWolf. Argentum is latin for Silver. Next time I can name change I'm going to make it ArgentumLupus which is just SilverWolf in latin.
replies.body_tagged: My original name was 07SilverWolf. Argentum is latin for Silver. Next time I can name change I'm going to make it ArgentumLupus which is just SilverWolf in latin.
